TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RibbonTabHeadersPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class RibbonTabHeadersPanel Inherits Panel Implements IScrollInfo
type RibbonTabHeadersPanel = class inherit Panel interface IScrollInfo

Docs.summary: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of the tab headers in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
